reviews.review: Although the people playing can make the game annoying, its still very good and I enjoy playing this game a lot. I'd be careful if you rage easily though lol

Can be infuriating at times, but fun others, it's really just dependent on who you're playing against and what kind of mood you're in. It's all about mindgames, so if you're looking for a chill experience to relax to it's probably not your best bet, but the game gets a lot more fun if you're playing with friends.

I used to play DBD on switch and, although it was laggy, the gameplay has always been fun! With the semi-recent visual update the game is easier to see and a lot more fair. Some maps/playables do need reworks but the dev team is great and is always fixing stuff. Overall the game is fun and you can play with your friends!

A really fun game with multiple maps, different characters (both killer and survivor), and with multiple different build options as you progress through the game. Recommended for groups of friends and single players. Don't need DLC to play all the maps, but will need DLC to play the other survivors and killers with the abilities they offer.
É uma mistura de amor e ódio s2
Buen juego, muy divertido y original
it doesnt get boring when you play with friends and the graphics are amazing and it is just a good way to kill time
Christ fix your servers, every update i swear
Nobody reads the reviews for sure, so I'll say I'm gay

I wanna be honest here. This game indeed has a super toxic community. Regardless, if you play this game with a squad of atleast 2 people it's so much fun! The movement and the amount of options to how to achieve the goal or how to occupie the killer is amazing! There are so many different ways to have fun. Also this game has a really good team. The trailers are just stunning. I love to watch those everytime. There comes one with every new chapter, which has been realeased. Also the animations of the game itself is well done! I do recommend this game, but not if you want to play it alone.
If you think being stuck on hook for 10 minutes and having the killer breathe down your neck the second you get saved is fun, this is the game for you!
Great game! 400 hrs played so far and im not getting tired of it
игры впринципе классная, но зачастую тебе попадаются клоуны в команде которые либо руинят либо как отсталые дети ходят и не понимают что происходит, вполне игрушка стоит своих денег

Between the toxic nature on both sides, the "loading simulator" for every task on the map rather than something engaging, bad matchmaking overall, and a score of bugs that never get resolved or seemingly "make a return" patches later, I'd avoid this game until there's a solid discount for the game and its DLC content. It's not worth full price. Why do I still play it? Good question. It might be the YouTube content.
This game is a really fun game. Can make you mad sometimes though

За возможность оценить спектр услуг предоставляемых маньяком в конце раунда(в конце катки можно оценить игру) лайк. Влад орет как сучка, а марата на выходе всегда е бут(один хуй это никто читать не будет почему бы не написать то что думаю о своих тиммейтах). А чуть не забыл.Илья- дол боеб
Game is great, fun with friends, solo is meh. Game is aggravating but I mean what online multiplayer isn't? You will be bullied on either side, survivor, killer, or lag. Love it

Só baixe se for masoquista ou tenha distúrbios psicológico relacionados a psicopatia. O jogo é repleto de Bugs que prejudicam absurdamente a jogabilidade, e enfurecem os jogadores casuais. Não exite um competitivo palpável do jogo, e a extremamente poucos players jogando simultaneamente, o que limita absurdamente as possibilidades de cair com um esquadrão que saiba jogar o minimo para tornar uma partida minimamente divertida ou disputada. Logo minha recomendação é, não comprar o jogo em hipótese alguma!
Высер разрабов для любителей поесть дерьма

trash

still trash

STILL TRASH

Update: Still TRASH

Поиграл я не так много, чтобы написать какой-то весомый отзыв. Могу сказать, что в этой игре много неписаных правил, которые вы можете не выполнять или выполнять, которые составили комьюнити этой игры. Про баланс игры не могу описать точно, но всё таки как никакой баланс в игре есть. Так же можно играть в пати за сурвов (выживших) и ману (убийце) может быть чуть сложнее играть, но всё таки обыграть пати возможно. В принципе играть в эту довольно таки прикольно, но веселее всё же конечно с друзьями, но увы у меня нет друзей, которые могут позволить себе эту игру или же они почему-то просто не хотят и говорят типо такого: "Нууу... эммм... эта игра слишком однообразна..."
esse jogo é uma bosta, porém n consigo passar um dia sem jogar, nunca entre nesse caminho do mau
arreglan 1 bug, y aparecen 10. Pero para jugar con amigos 10/10
Made my balls tingle fr fr
quieres perder pelo para el resto de tu vida? dbd es lo tuyo
Love this game and would definitely recommend to others
it's great if you don't mind the fairly often camper and tunneller. there's a lot of good in the game, just a lot of bad players, too.
can be buggy but i belive content will move forward and either way its fun af highly recommend
fun game billy right click go br speed

Recomendo totalmente o jogo.
Diferente de tudo que já joguei e com certeza melhor que o LoL
great game for horror and non-horror lovers alike has a bit of blood but is perfect for friends in survivor mode, has a lot teamwork whilst also good for the lonely players out there in killer mode.

é frustrante e só tem macaco jogando. 
survivor é uma raça de troglodita q só sabe dar tbag e no final acaba tomando um cacete. 
e os killers tem uma hitbox cagada onde pular uma janela pra escapar dele é quase q 90% das vezes inutil, pq por mais que vc pule ele te pega qnd acaba a animação (teve uma vez q eu pulei e dei uns dois passos pra longe da janela e o fudido me acerta o hit mesmo assim).
fora q na maioria das vezes os killers colocam NOED, q é só uma muleta pra eles virarem a partida no final e mascarar a falta de habilidade deles.
sem contar que em TODO mapa vc fica preso por algum detalhe idiota do cenário
resumindo: é tipo lol, só joga se vc quiser ter um avc
The game is extremely fun but I don't like how some of the killers are cracked out and that people tunnel in the game. Learn how to play correctly!
可不可以不要每次更新都這麼搞 今天1.9G的更新完後說要驗證驗證了快兩個小時 我前面1.9G只更新了10分鐘耶???
Hrozne moc ma to bavi. Milujem DBD odporucam ak mate radi aj horrorove hry.

Honestly this game is awesome, there are many mechanics that you can take advantage and with new characters coming there are new perks that change the game so much. The game is fair for both the killer and the survivor.

Okay, so learning the ins and outs of this game will take you time, ALOT of time, but once you pump in that time and learn to find a balance of being good at the game, not sweating like an absolute try hard and crying every time you get hooked. You grab some friends and it will be the time of your life. And playing killer is the same way because nothing will be more satisfying than hitting a cocky survivor with Deathslinger and watching them DC mid reel. It's not for everyone, and yes it does have it's flaws but if you think you'll like it, give it a shot. If you don't end up regretting it, than my god you have found something amazing.
Bardzo fajna gra jak chcecie sobie pograć ze znajomymi. Do masteringu oraz try hardowania też polecam
Este título juega con tus emociones, las lleva al extremo y puedes ser muy feliz o llegar a enfadarte. Lo recomiendo si te gusta lo extremo en emociones.
es un buen juego lo recomiendo mucho saca actualizaciones muy divertidas y el juego en verdad es muy bueno
Very good game. Its one of my favorites^^ the Game is good balanced and the rank system is very nice. All the diffrent characters and items are just nice and well thought.
love the game just to good
Very fun but can get annoying depending on the kind of games you have. Highly recommend going to the owners and giving them some love
go play the roblox verison. much more fun

Es excelente, jamás podrás aburrirte de este juego, si eres fan del terror clásico, los DLC's son una joya.

Espero que Chucky esté pronto en dbd.
very nice and cool game excepting leather face players
